headline: Ask HN: How do you report downtime?
description:
My company needs a highly reliable way to report downtime to our users. We've been using statuspage.io. The problem is that it seems to be dependent on AWS. So when the bi-monthly AWS outage takes our application down, we're not able to effectively report to our users!

Can anyone recommend a better solution?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你如何报告停机时间？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你如何報告停機時間？
description_zh-Hans:
我的公司需要一种高度可靠的方式来向我们的用户报告停机时间。我们一直在使用statuspage.io。问题是，它似乎依赖于AWS。因此，当AWS每两个月一次的停工使我们的应用程序瘫痪时，我们无法有效地向用户报告！

有人能推荐一个更好的解决方案吗？
